title: I have a question.
body: So i was wondering if i (for example) get perma banned what happens to the rp i have spent or i have remaining on that account does that stay there forever, i have spent over $2500 on league. Just wondering even tho I haven’t even been chat restricted yet. BUT, i feel like playing yasuo :)

They keep ur account locked, I feel u though. I had the same shit happen. got a perma ban before even getting my account suspended or put on chat restriction. But yeah all your money and remaining rp stays on that account and ur not able to recover it.
Ahhh hopefully no one triggers my second me (:

The *vast* majority of players will never see a punishment, and of those that do, 75%~ will never see a second. If you haven't seen a punishment before, I wouldn't be too worried. 

Honour is a good metric here, if you find yourself hitting checkpoints much slower than everyone else, chances are your behaviour could be better and you may be at risk of a punishment.
I am honor 5 with 11 check point orbs does that mean im alg? Oh and i didn't become a typical yasuo instead i ended up untilting my team to victory!
You're tracking a bit above average in fact. Keep it up :)
I am honor 5 with 11 check point orbs does that mean im alg?

The only way you'd get an instant perma ban is if the penalty was for cheating, chargebacks or compromise (security lock). If you received a permanent suspension for a different offence with no priors, something isn't right.

If you get perma'd you don't get ANYTHING back, sucks to be you spending that much, i was pissed after only spending $500 when i was perma'd

Now i can get banned with no fear of losing money, since i see no reason to spend money on a game that i'll lose all the money i have spent on the off occasion i make one slightly toxic remark
